title: Ruth Meets Boaz
description:
Readings from:
Ruth 2:1-3, 8, 10-12
Today's passages were read by Emily Brewer. Emily and her husband, Quinn, are on staff with Cornerstone Church at Illinois State University.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
